title: Too Many Runes
body:
Does anybody know how to get rid of runes? Last year I had too much IP and ended up buying all the runes from Tier 1 to Tier 3, but part way through Tier 2 I couldn't buy anymore, not even the Tier 3 runes I wanted to get for some champs to use.

Why is there a tier limit? Despite that, is there any way to get rid of the lower tier runes so I can just buy all the Tier 3 runes instead?

replies.body:
Hey there,

There's no tier limit, just a hard limit imposed by the game on how many runes you can own total. I can't recall the hard limit exactly.

If you wish to have any content removed from your account, you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can assist with account-specific inquiries.
